subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andre Iguodala scored a season-high 31 points, Andre Miller had a triple-double with 21 points, 12 assists and 10 rebounds, and the host Philadelphia 76ers clinched a playoff spot with a 95-90 victory over the Detroit Pistons. The 76ers are fifth in the Eastern Conference. ¶Charlotte Bobcats shooting guard Raja Bell’s right calf is not injured as seriously as first thought, and he will be day-to-day. A team official said Bell has a strained calf. Bell.
